gameDetails.name: Treasure Hunter: Queenie 1 â€“ Band of Goblins
gameDetails.description:
An expansion sheet for Treasure Hunter containing 6 Goblin tiles:


    Greedy Goblin (steals 1 coin from everybody)
    Scout Goblin (Everybody discards 1 card from the 9 cards)
    Buddy Goblin (adds a 4th goblin)
    Goblin Captain (makes the other goblins 1 stronger)
    Clumsy Goblin (makes the other goblins 1 weaker)
    Brute Goblin (no special effect, but you need 5 paws to pass him).
